verbose_text: XREF_BIBR Diluted Russell viper venom time (dRVVT) and silica clotting time (SCT) were performed in three steps (screening, mixing, and confirm) and expressed as ratio of coagulation times of patient 's plasma to pooled normal plasma (PNP) for all the procedures.
